a tester :

prob                       V

0.plot
-plot_static               V
-plot multi


1.grid corr
-prob mg                   V        
-restrict				   V 
-prolong                   V

-restr puis prol           V

2.method
-compute res
-gaussResL/u
-add vect

-stationnary iter
-back/forw

-finir mg method
-tester
